long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sourcery is an extension that attemps to highlight source code files in the browser. For example, if one were to browse to http://example.com/script.js, instead of the default black text on a white background, the result would be highlighted with one of many themes. Alongside said themes, the extension also allows the user to write custom CSS.
